page.title: 05TREORCHY YOUTH CLUB
page.content: TREORCHY YOUTH CLUB HAS BEEN OPEN FOR 15 YEARS.AGE OF ENTRY IS 11+.THERE ARE MANY ACTIVITIES.THE MOST POPULAR ONES ARE DISCO DANCING,HAIR AND BEAUTY AND SPORTS.OVER{300 CHILDREN}ATTEND THE YOUTH CLUB.THERE ARE EQUAL NUMBERS OF BOYS AND GIRLS.THEY VISIT AND COMPETE AGAINST OTHER YOUTH CLUBS REGULARLY. THERE IS A{RHONDDA ASSOCIATION}AND A {MID GLAMORGAN ASSOCIATION}WHO ORGANIZE SPORTING AND CULTURAL COMPETITIONS.THE WELSH ASSOCIATION OF YOUTH CLUBS ALSO ORGANIZE COMPETITIONS.22 ADULTS ARE EMPLOYED AT THE YOUTH CLUB. MOST CHILDREN WHEN INTERVIEWED HAD MIXED FEELINGS ABOUT THE YOUTH CLUBS PROVISIONS.SOME FELT THEY WERE REASONABLY GOOD,BUT MOST OF THE CHILDREN AGREED THAT THERE SHOULD BE DANCE CLASSES TAUGHT TO HELP THEM WITH THEIR BREAKDANCING AND BODY POPPING DANCES.
